app.name: LAB100 - Hello World with LED Blinking Template
app.category: Applied Embedded Systems Lab by AIC and BiiL Center
app.description: This template show how to print the message and control a LED blinking.

app.name: LAB101 - USER Input and Output Controlling Template
app.category: Applied Embedded Systems Lab by AIC and BiiL Center
app.description: This template show how to control USER INPUT and OUTPUT (CYBSP_USER) on evaluation kit board.
